headline: Perimeter Solutions, SA (PRM) Earnings Expected to Grow: Should You Buy?
summary: Perimeter Solutions, SA (PRM) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.
